name: Animal Painters
description:
Multiplayer shooter with paint mechanics. It is very lightweight (10MB) and fast paced machanics.

With Dozen of weapons and 2 scenarios implemented procedurally: The Maze and the Perlin Noise Terrain.

Two Characters: the frog and dog. Each animal is supposed to have their own movement properties and an ultimate (not implemented yet!).

Different modes to implement(Elimination, Conquest, Bomb, Flag, Etc).
